title: Laid Off by Twitter, Then Tweeting About It
description: Tech companies that created more workplace transparency see their own tools used to critique them.
dc:creator: Emma Goldberg
media:credit: Jason Henry for The New York Times
media:description: Elon Musk has taken to Twitter in recent days to flex his new power on the platform: “Trash me all day,” he wrote jokingly on Saturday. “But it’ll cost $8.”
